p: The relative abundance of dodonic acid ( 1) was high in all the five populations, whereas hautriwaic acid lactone ( 3) was present in Nanyuki, Machakos and Gazi coastal collections ( Figure 6). In addition, the relative abundance of 5,7,4′,5′-tetrahydroxy-3,6,2′-trimethoxyflavone ( 2) was high in the Gazi coastal plants as compared with the other groups.
